title: EV Survey
description: We have short easy survey for you to complete.
Tips: Have your say and tell us your views on electric vehicles. As an incentive to complete this short survey we will give away. 30 x R100 Cash vouchers for 8min survey. Total payout of R3000.00. Thats correct you can claim your share of vouchers with just 8mins of your time. 30 lucky respondents will win a voucher for R100.00 in cash. ou have an excellent chance of winning.

title: Dear Respondents
description: We invite you to participate in a brief survey designed to gather insights from individuals who are *over the age of 41*. *Your honest feedback is invaluable to us, and we want to emphasize* the importance of providing truthful information.
Tips: As a token of our appreciation for your time, you will receive a generous incentive R20* for completing the survey. If you know of anyone over the age of 41 please forward this message to them. Please note that we are unable to accept dishonest responses, as they compromise the integrity of our research. If you want to participate please email us at support@springvaleonline.co.za

title: Pics Survey
description: We have short easy survey for you to complete.
Tips: This is different from normal research surveys in that we will ask you to take some photos of various places in your home (for example the inside of your fridge, cupboard etc.) because we want to see what brands people are using nowadays without asking so many questions. The survey and ALL the images will be completely anonymous and will be analysed by a machine using AI vision. At no time will anyone be able to link any of the survey responses or images back to you. As an incentive to complete this short survey we will give away. 25 x R100 Cash vouchers for 8min survey. Total payout of R2 500.00. Thats correct you can claim your share of vouchers with just 8mins of your time. 25 lucky respondents will win a voucher for R100.00 in cash. You have an excellent chance of winning.

title: R10.00 Instagram Study
description: You will receive R10 complete this survey
Tips: Please note that simply clicking through the survey will not qualify you for payment. It is essential to read each statement carefully before answering. Rushing through the survey and selecting answers at random will not benefit anyone, and your responses will be discarded. Be aware that there are attention check questions designed to ensure thoughtful participation. Many respondents are paid R250 at at time, by dedicating time and effort to complete multiple surveys. The more surveys you finish, the more opportunities we will provide. Add R10 to your balance today by giving thoughtful answers. If you fail to provide meaningful responses or rush through the survey, your submission will be rejected by the client, and you will not receive payment. Please ensure your answers are honest and considered to qualify for compensation.
